body:
Hey everyone!

Sorry for bothering, but I need to ask you a question regarding Scrimmage.
Which time zone do you guys use to schedule a Scrimmage?

I'll give you guys an example!

Let's say I am living in Finland.
And my Scrimmage reservation runs from 11:00 PM to 1:00 AM.

Does it use America's time zone, or does it use EEST?
Please let me know!
Thanks!
body_tagged:

title: A Question about Scrimmage

replies.body: It tells you in your timezone, so you know the exact time to be on for the scrim.
replies.body_tagged: It tells you in your timezone, so you know the exact time to be on for the scrim.

replies.body: So let's say I am PST(which I am) it would say 1:00pm to 3:00pm at that helps me because that is my timezone. It carries to your timezone for you know when to be online :)
replies.body_tagged: So let's say I am PST(which I am) it would say 1:00pm to 3:00pm at that helps me because that is my timezone. It carries to your timezone for you know when to be online :)

replies.body:
Oh...I see!
Thank you SO SO much!
See you in a bit then!
Bye!
